extendedInfo.description: Use our call tracking features to automatically report calls made to clients and prospects.  Sort your customers based on your GPS location and see more prospects and close more deals.  This is made for sales managers to manage a sales team and increase sales activity by 20%.Sales Manager Features:* See calls to clients and prospects in a real-time stream* Fully intergrated with Google Places to check-in* Sales staff can see clients/prospects closest to them* Use our GPS tracking to see your staff whereabouts* Import/export customers into database easily* Automatic customer address geocoding* Easily assign groups of customers to sales reps* See all incoming/outgoing calls from sales team in real time* Automatically record calls into customer history* See all appointments in real time* See customers locations on map* Extensive reporting of all sales activities* Assign points to activities and events* Filter customers by last contacted date* Real-time location history for sales staff* Call Recording and storage* Wufoo Integration

reviews.title: So Simple
reviews.comment: Hands down the easiest way to manage an outside sales staff on the market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have for Sales Team
reviews.comment: Everything your team needs to be productive in the palm of your hand. CallProof will change the way to do business.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No more sales reports
reviews.comment: Been using to manage my outside sales team for the last 6 months... No more sales reports for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome :)
reviews.comment: This is really automatic.. no putting in sales call data anymore.  Easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: scam
reviews.comment: install -> sign non disclosure agreement agreeing to interact and pay 3rd parties, monthly fee between $40-$50 and they sell your info -> uninstall
reviews.author: Elizabeth Gatti

reviews.title: Unwanted calls from developers!!
reviews.comment: I\'ll have to admit, when I first downloaded this app, I thought it was great. In fact, I orginally gave it 5 stars. I spoke too soon though. As far as the app goes it\'s great. But here is what I didn\'t like. My dad gave me the HTC EVO I have as a gift a few weeks ago. I have not had it activated yet so it still has his number as the cell number logged in the phone. Apparently, they used information from my phone I wasn\'t aware of and using it to make follow-up and sales calls on the app to my dad who lives in Virginia. I\'m in Ohio. He received a phone call from Tennessee from someone. He texted asking who it was and this was the reply:  REP: Yes, this is XXX with Calc Horoid, are you busy this morning?   First of all, who and what is Calc Horoid? Then they texted back saying...  REP: I meant CallProof...  What the ### is going on??? First your calling someone who doesn\'t know anything about you. Then you can\'t even get the name of the product right. And there is more to that text, but bottom line is, after that episode... UNINSTALLED! My dad was upset with me because he assumed I had given his phone number out to businesses. So I had to straighten this crap out.
reviews.author: Jacqueline Mason

reviews.title: This app makes me money
reviews.comment: Sort your prospects by your location
reviews.author: A Google User
